content: the perfect fall accessory for any table crochet yourself a whole pumpkin patch to festoon your fall table easy beginner friendly instructions seamless construction crochet in the round photos and video stitch guides to help you along the way pattern details size approximately 19″ diameter 7″ tall including the stem gauge 5 single_crochet & 5 row = 1 inch gauge is not terribly important as long as your fabric is tight enough to prevent the stuffng from showing through hook size i 5 5mm yarn worsted weight yarn 20 yrds stem & leaf 100 yrds pumpkin we recommend twice sheared sheep everyday merino notions stitch marker row counter recommended 60g fiber fill stuffing scissors darning needle
